properties.areaDesc: Liberty; Eastern Pondera; Toole; Eastern Glacier
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 2:30AM MST until January 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills
occurring. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. For the Winter
Weather Advisory, snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations
of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind
chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero.

* WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Toole, Liberty and Eastern Pondera.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 5 PM MST Tuesday. For
the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For
the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow
could reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could
cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on
young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local
Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY
